exceptions.tactic: intros M x e1 e2 Hle y Hball.
intros M' x e1 e2 Hle y Hball.

exceptions.exn: In environment M : UniformSpace x : M e1, e2 : R H : e1 <= e2 y : M H0 : ball x e1 y Unable to unify "(let (ball, _, _, _) := UniformSpace.class M in ball) ?M2419 (?M2422 + ?M2423) ?M2421" with "(let (ball, _, _, _) := UniformSpace.class M in ball) x e2 y".
The reference Hball was not found in the current environment.

In environment M : UniformSpace H1 : forall (x y z : M) (e1 e2 : R), ball x e1 y -> ball y e2 z -> ball x (e1 + e2) z x : M e1, e2 : R H : e1 <= e2 y : M H0 : ball x e1 y Unable to unify "(let (ball, _, _, _) := UniformSpace.class M in ball) ?M2571 ?M2572 ?M2570" with "ball x e2 y \\/ ~ ball x e2 y".

exceptions.tactic: apply UniformSpace.ax2 with (m := UniformSpace.class M) (e := e1).

original: intros M x e1 e2 Hle y Hball. apply ball_triangle with (y := x). - apply Hball. - apply ball_sym. apply UniformSpace.ax2 with (m := UniformSpace.class M) (e := e1). + apply ball_sym. apply Hball. + apply Hball.
